casebody.data:
GOOD HOPE
v.
NCDHHS. No. 58A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 31, 2006. Maureen D. Murray, Susan M. Fradenburg, Greensboro, William W. Stewart, Jr., Raleigh, for Good Hope Health System. C. Winston Gilchrist, Lillington, for Town of Lillington. Melissa L. Trippe, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Marcus Lodge, for NCDHHS. Noah H. Huffstetler, III, Wallace C. Hollowell, III, K. Edward Greene, Kathleen A. Naggs, Raleigh, Denise M. Gunter, Winston-Salem, for Betsy Johnson Regional Hosp. S. Todd Hemphill, Diane E. Ricketts, Raleigh, for Amisub of NC. Forrest W. Campbell, Jr., for NC Hospital Asso.

The following order has been entered on the consent motion filed on the 27th day of July 2006 by Respondent and Respondent Intervenors for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Respondent and Respondent Intervenors shall have up to and including the 15th day of August 2006 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 31st day of July 2006."
